DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim evaluate relief chest pain first 30 minute among patient receive metoprolol alone compare metoprolol plus morphine
DOC.brief_title: Pain Relief Metoprolol Versus Metoprolol Plus Morphine Acute Chest Pain
DOC.criteria: Acute chest pain ECGsigns indicate myocardial ischemia Heart rate < 60 beats/min Systolic blood pressure < 110 mmHg High degree AVblock Signs obstructive pulmonary disease Signs pulmonary oedema Unwillingness Participation study Long delay arrival ambulance randomisation
